alert.note: Alert for Becker; Beltrami; Clay; Clearwater; Hubbard; Mahnomen; Norman; Otter Tail; Polk; Wadena (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 20 at 7:10PM CDT until June 20 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM CDT FOR EASTERN CLAY...HUBBARD...NORTHERN WADENA...NORMAN...SOUTHEASTERN POLK...NORTHERN OTTER TAIL...SOUTHWESTERN BELTRAMI...MAHNOMEN... BECKER AND CLEARWATER COUNTIES... At 709 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Gary to Hitterdal to near Perham, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Public These severe storms will be near... Ranum around 720 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Callaway, Westbury, Faith, Richwood, Mahnomen, Bejou, Sebeka and Beaulieu. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Becker; Beltrami; Clay; Clearwater; Hubbard; Mahnomen; Norman; Otter Tail; Polk; Wadena
